JavaCool303

Class Cool303Theme

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaCool303.Cool303Theme
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PastelTheme, WinterTheme

    public abstract class Cool303Theme
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Theme class, that can be extended by complete Themes
    Author:
    Hamza Can set a color, font, size and border for Cool303 components (buttons, roots and containers)
